description:
Description: Create a program to concurrently process multiple videos, such as resizing, cropping, or applying filters. 
Requirements: 
Implement a video processing system that allows multiple videos to be processed concurrently with different tasks.\
Ensure that video processing tasks are performed correctly and concurrently.\
Test Set: 
Provide a list of video files and processing tasks (e.g., resize, crop, filter).\
Execute processing functions concurrently.\
Verify that processed videos are saved correctly.

additional_instructions: because not given function prototype, you can decide it yourself
